This template demonstrates how the hamming distance between codewords can be calculated in CrypTool 2.0. The hamming distance is the amount of different bits between two codewords.\line\line Here, Codeword1 and Codeword2 are different. Thus, the hamming distance is greater than 0.\line Codeword2 and Codeword3 are equal. Thus, the hamming distance is 0.
